Range: Atlantic Ocean, New Brunswick, Nova Scotia
Not RV appropiate - comments: Brent Law: In terms of presence absence you can see foraging marks which means presence on the tidal flats at low water and can walk out or fly a drone.  The problem is the marks may be a few weeks or month old.  If you need presence/absence on a day scale then RV survey but if you just need to know if they occupy an area then you may be able to use other methods and the answer is No.
